mdRecord.dcterms:title: Steiner Haus, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Loos, Adolf (Austrian architect, designer, and theorist, 1870-1933) [Male]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Street front with one story and a dormer window. The garden facade is three storied and with the use of the semi-circular metal-sheathed roof Loos manages to articulate the transition between the front and garden elevations. - http://www.galinsky.com/buildings/steiner/ [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture and City Planning
dwellings
barrel roofs
